summary: Implements a handler that orchestrates communication with the Mistral large language model, building conversation payloads, incorporating tool definitions, sending requests, interpreting the model's output, and executing any derived actions. It supports both direct function‑calling mode and prompting‑based interaction, translating function specifications to the required OpenAPI format and managing result formatting.
business_intent: Enable seamless integration of the Mistral LLM into the function‑call evaluation platform, allowing users to benchmark and utilize Mistral’s capability to understand and invoke defined functions or tools within generated responses.
